parameters.name: Day
parameters.description: The date in UTC+8. Format: year-month-day.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the resource.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to cbwp, which specifies Internet Shared Bandwidth.
